description: Xilonen è un personaggio Geo di Liyue, specializzato nel danno Geo e nella manipolazione della terra. Eccelle nel danno fisico e Geo.
info: Xilonen si concentra su danno Geo e fisico. Priorità a CRIT, ATK% e Energy Recharge per uptime costante delle abilità.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Stone Spear
skills.desc: Performs up to 6 consecutive spear strikes.
skills.details_html:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 6 consecutive spear strikes.
Charged Attack
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to perform an upward thrust.
Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging enemies along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Earth's Embrace
skills.desc: Xilonen summons the power of the earth, dealing Geo DMG and creating a protective barrier.
skills.details_html:
Earth's Embrace
Xilonen summons the power of the earth, dealing Geo DMG and creating a protective barrier.

skills.name: Mountain's Fury
skills.desc: Xilonen unleashes the full power of the mountains, dealing massive Geo DMG to all nearby enemies.
skills.details_html:
Mountain's Fury
Xilonen unleashes the full power of the mountains, dealing massive Geo DMG to all nearby enemies.

passive_talents.name: Stone Heart
passive_talents.desc: Increases Xilonen's Geo DMG by 15% when her HP is above 70%.

passive_talents.name: Mountain's Blessing
passive_talents.desc: When Xilonen uses Earth's Embrace, all party members gain 10% increased DEF for 10s.

passive_talents.name: Earth's Guardian
passive_talents.desc: When Xilonen crafts Weapon Ascension Materials, she has a 10% chance to receive double the product.

constellations.name: Stone's Resolve
constellations.desc: Earth's Embrace's shield strength is increased by 20%.

constellations.name: Mountain's Strength
constellations.desc: Mountain's Fury grants an additional 15% Geo DMG Bonus to all party members for 10s.

constellations.name: Earth's Power
constellations.desc: Increases the Level of Mountain's Fury by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Stone's Protection
constellations.desc: When Xilonen's HP falls below 50%, she gains a 100% DEF Bonus.

constellations.name: Mountain's Legacy
constellations.desc: Increases the Level of Earth's Embrace by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Earth's Wrath
constellations.desc: Mountain's Fury deals an additional 50% DMG to enemies affected by Geo.
